Name: Conference series
Description: A conference is a regular or recurring meeting of people to "confer" about a topic. It may take many forms.

Properties.Name: Geographical scope
Properties.Description: 'Conferences may happen at different locations, and visitors from elsewhere can participate, but often conferences fall within some geographical scope. if not - list as 'international'

Properties.Name: Type of conference
Properties.Description: Concerns the format, not the subject
